name: xylonic
description: Modern Subsonic music streaming client with Spotify-like UI. Stream your music library from any Subsonic-compatible server (Navidrome, Airsonic, Gonic) with full playback controls, album art, and responsive design.

scripts.electron:serve: concurrently -k "cross-env BROWSER=none npm start" "wait-on http://localhost:3000 && electron ."
scripts.electron:serve:persist: concurrently -k "cross-env BROWSER=none SKIP_DEV_CLEAR=true npm start" "wait-on http://localhost:3000 && electron ."
scripts.electron:build: npm run prebuild:clean && npm run build && electron-builder
scripts.electron:build:win: npm run prebuild:clean && npm run build && electron-builder --win
scripts.electron:build:win-portable: npm run prebuild:clean && npm run build && electron-builder --win portable
scripts.electron:build:mac: npm run prebuild:clean && npm run build && electron-builder --mac
scripts.electron:build:linux: npm run prebuild:clean && npm run build && electron-builder --linux
scripts.electron:build:linux-tar: npm run prebuild:clean && npm run build && electron-builder --linux tar.gz
scripts.electron:build:linux-appimage: npm run prebuild:clean && npm run build && electron-builder --linux AppImage
scripts.electron:build:linux-portable: npm run prebuild:clean && npm run build && electron-builder --linux tar.gz
scripts.electron:build:all-portable: npm run prebuild:clean && npm run build && electron-builder --win portable --linux tar.gz
scripts.electron:dev: concurrently -k "cross-env BROWSER=none npm start" "wait-on http://localhost:3000 && electron . --inspect=5858"
